## Description

A clear description of the feature or improvement you'd like.

## Motivation

Why would this help students, TAs, or instructors using the presentation?

## Proposed Solution

If you have an idea for how it could work, describe it here.

## Alternatives Considered

Any other approaches you thought about.

## Additional Context

Screenshots, mockups, or links to similar examples.
